name: Kim Evans
text: Love your pizza.  I for one can not have spicy sauce.  Your is just perfect.  The app for Richmond needs some work.  Not everything works on the app.  Example the $5.99 pick your choice.  Tried to order it in the app and it kept telling ‚Ä¶More

name: Amy Gignac
text: Taste is what's to be expected for Hungry Howie's.  However, the pizza  has often been sliced unevenly or not completely sliced through.  We have used our own pizza slicer several times.

name: John O
text: Ordered from this location because our normal one in New Baltimore was closed. First, the prices are higher than the other location in New Baltimore for the same exact items. Second, the Howie bread was stale dry garbage that we threw out. ‚Ä¶More

name: Mell Pel
text: Fast Excellent service. Love using the App

name: Matt Gilson
text: Ordered 2 Large pizzas and a bread was done in a timely matter and when I went inside had to wait to see anyone at all for almost 2 full minutes. Then when I got home which was 8 mins away the pizza was AWFUL! Will definitely spend money on ‚Ä¶More

name: Lynn Blum
text: My in laws ordered and paid for a gluten free pizza that came on a small regular pizza crust so I couldn't eat tonight. This store may want to review dangers of food allergies with their workers

name: Alice A Weaver
text: Not happy with their buffalo chicken wings. The chicken tasted old.

name: Denise Jason
text: We always order from here, everyone is always super friendly, and if there is ever a mistake they always fix it immediately. Of course the food is great as well.

name: Derek Eschenburg
text: The counter person was a great and genuine kid. Very much enjoying his job. I ordered about $50 wort of stuff and he apologized that it would take about 20 minutes????? Really? Your kidding right???? He said no. I ‚Ä¶More

name: Blake Stuart
text: Always hot and fresh.

name: Veronica Der
text: The cashier was efficient & friendly and confirmed my order with me to make sure i had the right pizza and bread before i paid. Then, even though it was raining, one of the workers helped bring my large order all the way to my car for me. ‚Ä¶More

name: Tammy Gutt
text: I ordered a thin Christmas pizza well done, it was burnt and didn‚Äôt have pepperoni on it.   Wasn‚Äôt good.  We didn‚Äôt eat it.

name: Marcy Dooley
text: They know my name just like Cheers üòÅ

name: Elizabeth Milliken
text: If you accidentally give $63 more to one of their drivers don‚Äôt expect to get it back. Apparently Hungry Howie‚Äôs in Richmond hires dishonest drivers & the manager will back them up. Their pizza tastes great but their business practice is real tough to swallow.

name: Zach Ball
text: Small place, awesome staff that create an overall accommodating and pleasurable experience. I have stopped twice and they will go out of thier way to ensure you are satisfied. Keep it up guys, small business are tough. Best of luck!

name: Buck Master
text: This is the second time in 6 mths and I tried. I sat there waiting while my pizza cooked in the warmer waiting. The staff is friendly but there's alot going with the Friday rush. I get home and the cheese is already getting hard. I'm done with this place. Microwave half way saved it. Jets it is for now on.

name: Laura Bond
text: Always fast and gets the order correct

name: Austin Pawlak
text: I ordered a blt pizza and when I got my order it was a completely different pizza. When I called back and told them I was told they didn‚Äôt have a blt pizza on there menu despite them taking my order when i asked specificity for it. How ‚Ä¶More

name: MO3
text: I love this location! Theure so friendly & accomodating!!

name: Pulsar
text: The Richmond location has a serious management problem.  One of their delivery drivers nearly ran down my family while we were walking out dogs.  When we called them to complain, the manager stonewalled then hung up on us.

name: Uncle Friday
text: Great calzones

name: Blake Ritchie
text: I got delivery and my food was made incorrectly. I called to get it fixed" and the woman I spoke with was very rude. I'm sorry my wanting my order fixed was so inconvenient for you. I wont order here again.

name: Holly Castillo
text: Have had SEVERAL issues with delivery time over the past few months. I placed my order at 5:40pm today and was given a 40 minute delivery time. It is now 6:58 and still no pizza. I called at 6:37 and offered to have my husband pick it up if ‚Ä¶More

name: Matthew Sticky
text: It it was cool, not like I was chilling next two it though. That hair place next to it you should totally go, nice place

name: Laura Lindsay
text: Rude and cocky. I'll be sticking to Jet's! Delivery is way over 40 mins and I should have paid attention to the other reviews.

name: Brent Wodtke
text: Took an hour and a half to get our pizzas.  Rediculous.  We deserve free pizzas or something

name: DAnne Oja
text: Shhh...  maybe this should be a secret, but they put more toppings on there pizza compared to other hungry Howie locations near by.....

name: Vince Severini
text: Besides having good pizza, Hungry Howie's provides a wonderful community service by helping schools raise money for their sports teams. The cards kids sell for $20 has that much free stuff on them plus a boat load of coupons good for a year. Support Hungry Howie, because they support kids.

name: Bill Bailey
text: Great staff good food quick service

name: Eric Reeves
text: If I order online and follow the howie track and it says Its on the road, it better be on the road not sitting under your hotlamp for 20+ minutes, yeah "great" customer service. Never going to order from this place again!

name: Meaghan Niebauer
text: Ordered online, said 20 minutes. Had to wait another 20 minutes once i came to pick it up. Other customers were also told they had to wait even longer. Why state 20 minutes, when it‚Äôs way longer??

name: Scott Boyd
text: I had been ordering same gluten  free pizza since I found out my wife has gluten intolerance....same price...then one day I tried to explain to the New 0manager that she had charged me too much....her response was it's only a buck...there ‚Ä¶More

text: Good service and food

name: kara dison

name: michelle coldwell
text: Pizza is ok but they never quite get the toppings all over the pizza just the center and never very many and I never get my special crust or extra cheese

name: Janinne Collings
text: can't find a place to reply so sending new message. You asked how you could up your game... I like Jet's Pizza sauce much more than yours. ITs got some tang or a bit of spice to it. Yours is bland in comparison. That's the big difference for me.

name: Nora Stahl
text: Ordered a chicken bacon ranch pizza, the bottom was Soo greasey I had to use 3 napkins to soak it up. The center wasn't cooked all the way. Ugh..

name: Bryan Milliken
text: Price isn't worth what you pay. You can get better pizza and prices elsewhere. Coupons are a joke!

name: John Wilton
text: Quick and friendly, as usual.

text: Very helpful and the pizza was great.

name: Jennifer Schultz
text: Pizza was delicious, bread was a little too well done.

name: John Bess
text: Great Pizza

text: The pizza was soggy, the crust had very little flavor, and the sauce was lacking.

name: Douglas McLaren Sr
text: I love there pizza and. Price

name: Matthew Cooper
text: The service here was great, the staff was friendly and the pizza was made to perfection. I definitely will be coming back, i was very impressed how friendly the staff was, theres nothing to complain about!

name: Gregory Hubert
text: Pizza was good.

text: Always forgets my dipping sauce and will not deliver 5 miles away anymore.

name: Chris Auito
text: Waiting for over an hour now for a sub and a two liter .. I live about 1/8 mile away. Unacceptable.

name: Michael Maenza
text: I can't help it. My favorite Michigan pizza. I always have to order once from here when I visit the Detroit area.

name: Jason Mrosz
text: Of course Hungry Howies pizza was good. The slowest branch I have ever been to.
